tasks.task: Roll a bale into the truck
subtasks: Approach the bale
Lift the bale onto the wheelbarrow
Push the wheelbarrow to the truck
Align the bale with the truck bed
Lower the bale into the truck bed
Position the truck behind the stack
Engage the reverse gears
Observe the rear view
Start moving in reverse

tasks.task: Attach the topper to the baler
subtasks: Secure the topper to the baler's tailgate
Position the topper over the output chute
Ensure proper fit before unhooking

tasks.task: Repeat the process of rolling, backing up, attaching
subtasks: Validate the stacking order
Repeat for subsequent bales
Monitor balance of the stack
Signal the operator to stop
Identify the bale at the tailgate
Coordinate the timing of bale roll-off and stacking
Check for stability of each bale added
Prevent toppling by organizing rows properly
Mistake corrections if a bale rolls off
Approach the truck bed
Edge the wheelbarrow near the truck opening
Lift the bale from the truck bed
Transfer the bale into the wheelbarrow
Roll the wheelbarrow to the desired location
Download the bale from the wheelbarrow
Place the bale in the correct spot

tasks.task: Secure the baler attach to the truck
subtasks: Align the baler attachment hooks with the truck's trailer hitch
Hook the baler to the truck
Tighten any securing straps

tasks.task: Prepare for the next baler operation
subtasks: Ensure the bales are stacked safely
Check that all attachments are correctly positioned
Plan the direction and route for the next set of bales
